creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
When I use the demo of 1.2.1 at
http://olr.kbs.uni-hannover.de:8888/default/live/index.html
and search for "Lenya" I get one hit.

When I then change the "Sort by" field from "Score" to "Title" and search again
I get no hit list.

See also bug 29023 in which this problem was mentioned in comment #3.

creator: bobharner@gmail.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 29168 ***
